channel.title: Comments on: Another Comment Spam Attack

item.title: By: Phillybits
item.dc:creator: Phillybits
item.description:
Hopefully you get this comment on this old post of yours. I recently have been getting loads of hits from Performance Systems International but based out of Los Angeles.
I was wondering if you had ever followed up and found anything more about them.
The only thing I can think of in my case is that I recently signed up for Google Adsense and Analytics on my website but I don't know if PSI started showing up on my site before or afterwards.
item.content:encoded:
Hopefully you get this comment on this old post of yours. I recently have been getting loads of hits from Performance Systems International but based out of Los Angeles.

I was wondering if you had ever followed up and found anything more about them.

The only thing I can think of in my case is that I recently signed up for Google Adsense and Analytics on my website but I don’t know if PSI started showing up on my site before or afterwards.

item.title: By: Mark
item.dc:creator: Mark
item.description: This is becoming more common and much more frustrating. Check out my three strikes plugin to rid yourself of most of these automatically.
item.content:encoded: This is becoming more common and much more frustrating. Check out my three strikes plugin to rid yourself of most of these automatically.
